article: what is meetngreetme ? meetngreetme is a blockchain-based universal travel app that attracts the attention of people who are in certain areas that require travel services with an environmental client willing to provide the service . this system was established to accommodate ico because of its digital data crypt , welcomecoin . the organization 's primary mission is to build an online commercial center for environmental-level services for universal travelers . remember to expand meetngreetme as an administration , the organization holds ico to offer its welcomecoin . investing in meetngreetme 's welcomecoin provides an opportunity to leverage digital currencies within an organization 's environment to purchase concierge services if you ever visit one of the areas where the meetngreetme service is .

meetngreetme is currently the most common ico . this does not mean that the organization or administration is average ; it 's just that the typical ico has come to represent a crowdsourcing organization of specialized products and services that rely on blockchain innovation technology . welcome coin flight attendant service has experts with bad experiences in everything related to travel . his job is to give you the additional experience you deserve on the go . meetngreetme to-bemeetngreetme deals with people from all over the world . we ensure security , trust , transparency , easy access to training and support essential for scaling at the right pace while increasing loyalty and keeping service quality high .

community involvement in this process will contribute positively to the trust factor because each application will get the dose of attention necessary to ensure its trust . because of blockchain technology , it probably allows crowdsource platform curation processes that are a sensible way to operate a global peer-to-peer business . adapting blockchain technology will enable meetngreetme to have its own means -- meetngreetme crypto-token -- to incentivize contributors and appreciate activities related to platform growth and development . welcomecoin as a rightthe welcomecoin holder is exclusively entitled to the following rights : right to participate in platform development , vote on questions related to budget allocation , business development , additions and excludes new features .

this right is available for 10 % of users who have the largest number of tokens . the right to participate in voting on questions such as : rewarding users with the best performance , evaluating incoming initiatives and encouraging their generators , etc. . the right to use the platform and to directly participate in it for further development purposes and gain an advantage over their efforts . right to access community events . right to get a discount for meetngreetme service , and partner services . right to play a chosen role and rewarded for it . welcomecoin as currencypaying ads .

wel can be used to install targeted ads on meetngreetme platforms , including their blogs . before advertised the product , service and place first need to be proven by the local community . we are considering adding an opportunity to pay for meetngreetme services at welcomecoins in the future . icothe exact date of the main crowdsale will be determined later and will last for 4 weeks . ico will have a minimum limit of 1 000 000 usd . initial donors will get bonuses . the bonus rate will drop every week , starting from 9 % and ending with 0 % in the last week of the crowdsale .

token wel150 ,000,000 wel will be issued with 75,000,000 wel available in crowdsale . this is a one time emission . pre-sale begins on december 11 , 2017 soft cap1 .000.000 usd / 10.000.000 welhard cap7 ,500,000 usd / 75,000,000 welreceived currencyeththe exchange rate token1 wel = 0.0004 eth1 wel = 0.10 usddistributionraised funds distributionall funds accumulated during the crowdsale will be allocated to support the growth of meetngreetme further with a focus on marketing activities directed at growth and expansion , platform development and community development . roadmapbeginning of 2014meetngreetme idea2014 -- 2015soil check and first recognition : international business summit in morocco ; sxsw in austin , texas ; producthunt .

attention of such mass media as business insider , cofounder , go europe , etc. . beginning of 2016company registration in estonia and residence in business incubator of high technologies park . may 2016launch of a fully operational platform with an integrated payment system ; development of the global community . autumn 2016the first clients of meetngreetme are private clients and whole delegations ; receipt of the first income . spring 2017recognition of the un in the category `` travel and hospitality '' ; mitgriters in more than 200 cities around the world . august-september 2017blockchain experts join our team .

december 2017ico : to turn meetngreetme into a tool that changes people 's approach to planning and organizing their travels , meetngreetme launches pre-ico in december . first half of 2018community development : a decentralized management system ; messenger for ios ; advanced crm-system ; training community members ; marketing and pr-events in new cities . third quarter 2018growing platfoma . partnership and expansion in new cities : implementation of a partner base , segmented by roles and geography ; the emergence of new partners in new cities ; advanced functionality for managing profiles meetngreetme ; advanced system of matching and selection of mittgritors for users ' requests ; new key cities .

fourth quarter of 2018implementation of smart contracts for decentralized management . the introduction of functionality for advertising on the platform . p2p payment system . 2019further scaling : the emergence of new services , big data , access to new markets , scaling algorithms . teamfor more information please visit : website : : heremy eth address : 0x45cc001673969f7a5e77ab858bad85d650427227 .
